Kum a thar vanga Kristianten inhlan tharnate leh thutiam thar Kan tualchhung kohhran chuan kumthar thupuiah, 'Kan Pathian, kan nei țhin hi a țhain a lâwmawm ngawt mai. Mi țhenkhatin Kristakan Puipa pangngai, kan hma lam beiseina' tih kan hmang a. Kum a lo tana nun bul an țan phah chuan hlu tak a ni. Amaherawh chu, kanrala, a lo thar leh a, kan puipa, kan innghahna, min enkawltu leh min inhlanna chhan zawk tur dik tak chu Pathian khawngaihna avangin, kanhruaitu kan Pathian erawh chu a pangngai reng a. Hun leh kum liam zêl sualte phura kan thih ai a thih avangin a ni. Paula chuan Rom mitehian kan Pathian ropuina hi a tichuai ve chuang lova, kan Pathian hnenah chiang takin a hrilha, Unaute u, Pathian khawngaihna avanghmangaihna hi a tikiam ve chuang hek lo. Ral zêl leh danglam țhin chu hian nung, thianghlim leh Pathian lawm tlâk ni turin in taksa hlan rawhkeini hringfate hi kan lo ni zawk a, innghahnatlâk leh beiseitlâk reng u a ti a ni. Kum a thar vanga inhlanna hian damchhung a daih chuan akan lo ni tak tak lo. Kumtharah hian kan Puipa pangngai hi vuan nghet țha tho ve, mahse, ni leh thla a liam zêl a, kum a lo hluia, kan inhlannasauh ila. Kan beiseina pawh thil danga thlâk kual lovin Lalpaah ni zual pawh a hlui ve zêl chuan kan inhlanna chhan a fuh loh vang a ni ngeisauh se la a va țha dawn êm. Tita ang hian, ka mimal nunah, ka ang. Kum a thar chang chauha inhlan thar țhin lovin Pathianchhungkuaah, kan kohhranahte beiseina lâwmawm, Chhandamtu Isua khawngaihna ropui lutuk vang hian inhlan zawk ila. Kumin hi PathianKrista ropuina inlarna chuw beiseiin nghak tlat ila. Chhandamtu Isua tana tih takzet a nun bul kan țanna lo ni se la. Pathianin kan nun hi aKrista ropuina inlarna beiseitute nun aia nun itawm a awm miah hman thianghlim atan hlan ila. Pathian khawngaihna avangin kan kuttelovang. Kan nun pawh hi Isua ropuina inlarna atana kan pek phal kum pawh Pathian thuin pharchhuak se la, a khawngaihna avang hian \"kalo ni se la. Kan chhungkuaah pawh Isua a inlar theihna atana hmun kan duhthlanna hi ka pe, i taah chantir ang che\" tiphal tawh ila. Kan inhlanken kum lo ni se la. Kan khawsak kawng tinrengah Isua inlarna kan thar anih rau rau chuan theory aiin practical kan uar a hun ta a ni,beisei nasat kum lo ni se la.
